mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBERS (EMAIL , NAME , PASSWORD , SALT , JOIN_DATE , LATEST_LOGIN_IP , LATEST_PASSWORD_CHANGE_DATE , LATEST_LOGIN_DATE , LATEST_LOGIN_FAIL_DATE , LOGIN_FAIL_COUNT , LOGIN_YN , BLOCK_YN) VALUES (#{email} , #{name} , #{password} , #{salt} , SYSDATE , NULL , SYSDATE , NULL , NULL , 0 , 'N' , 'N' )
mapper.select: SELECT EMAIL , NAME , PASSWORD , SALT , JOIN_DATE , LATEST_LOGIN_IP , LATEST_PASSWORD_CHANGE_DATE , LATEST_LOGIN_DATE , LATEST_LOGIN_FAIL_DATE , LOGIN_FAIL_COUNT , LOGIN_YN , BLOCK_YN FROM MEMBERS WHERE EMAIL = #{_parameter}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBERS SET LATEST_LOGIN_FAIL_DATE = SYSDATE , LOGIN_FAIL_COUNT = LOGIN_FAIL_COUNT + 1 WHERE EMAIL = #{_parameter}
UPDATE MEMBERS SET BLOCK_YN = 'Y' WHERE EMAIL = #{_parameter} AND LOGIN_FAIL_COUNT >= 5
UPDATE MEMBERS SET LOGIN_FAIL_COUNT = 0 , LATEST_LOGIN_DATE = SYSDATE , LATEST_LOGIN_IP = NULL , LOGIN_YN = 'Y' WHERE EMAIL = #{_parameter}
